Module TypedElementFramework
Header /Engine/Source/Runtime/TypedElementFramework/Public/Elements/Framework/TypedElementRegistry.h
Include #include "Elements/Framework/TypedElementRegistry.h"

Syntax

UCLASS (Transient, MinimalAPI)  
class UTypedElementRegistry : public UObject

Remarks

Registry of element types and their associated interfaces, along with the elements that represent their instances.
